page.title: 18GOXHILL PLAYING FIELD CONT.
page.content: Concern has been caused amongst local people with the start of the BMX Fun - Track because it is close to housing; has necessitated resiting children's apparatus; is likely to make grass cutting difficult; will attract older children and put off the younger ones. The Playing Fields Association intend to fence off the playing field's entrance to prevent motorcycles entering as they now do. They say that the children's apparatus is being resited to make room for a toddler area but this places that facility alongside an unfenced, waterfilled ditch. On visiting the school the police saw work in progress and were worried as to who would supervise activities on the scheme's completion. A family "Fun Afternoon", which is hoped to become an annual event, is planned and may allay people's fears.
